channel.title: Cursed Mystic Staff [Show - Off]
channel.description:
Well i decided to get back into modeling a bit. I have worked hard to improve my skills so hope you guys like this staff.
[b]Time Taken: 1 1/2 days. Texture State: Full Creator: lukenuke75 Credits: 100% lukenuke75 Poly Count: Well idk how to obtain this :S Runescape Ready: NO! Triangulated: NO![/b]
front image:
[img]http://memberfiles.freewebs.com/31/21/35412131/photos/misc-pics/staff%20front.PNG[/img]
Back image:
[img]http://memberfiles.freewebs.com/31/21/35412131/photos/misc-pics/staff%20back.PNG[/img]
left side:
[img]http://memberfiles.freewebs.com/31/21/35412131/photos/misc-pics/staff%20side.PNG[/img]
Wireframe:
[img]http://memberfiles.freewebs.com/31/21/35412131/photos/misc-pics/wireframe.PNG[/img]
[center][u][b]Story Behind The Staff[/b][/u][/center]
There once was a cursed mage. He wanted to rule the whole world, but one determined hero would not allow him. The cursed mage struck with a powerful bolt of lightning. He was defeated shortly after that war of the century, leaving behind his cursed staff. His staff was a very valued item, until it fell into the wrong hands. Now it is the most feared item in all the lands. Only one mighty warrior is brave enough to hold the staff.
**Note: I made up a story to give it some back ground.

Nice idea, but poly overkill and simple use of the bend tool, sorry
[/quote]

Personally I fk up with the bend tool… the knife tool works just as efficiently if you know what you’re doing.[/quote]this is true, i guess im taking it too seriously
